name: Brutal Doom: ZioMcCall's Vision
summary:
Tired of the vanilla deathmatch,where the only good gun is the SSG?
In ZioMcCall's DOOM all the original weapons was remade,with smooth animations,damage re-scripted and balanced,Alt-fire system for the great part of the weapons and reload.This mod replaces even the Skulltag's deathmach weapons,so you can play with a new Grenade Launcher and a new Railgun,with scope mode. The only new weapon present in the game is the Assault rifle,wich you spawn(there is the classic pistol,don't worry).This mod is consigliable only for PvP online game modes and not for co-op and Single player.Maybe an Co-op version will exit later.
